column3: “this shit made me jump out a window and bite a dog.”

“Early girl was the perfect strain to sit outside, listen to music, and drink sweet tea on a summer day with some friends. It tasted super sweet,  piney, and the high was exceptional. 5 out of 5 stars!”

“Very decent bud overall. Takes a bit more than usual to get the high you want, and it's definitely shorter than most other strains, but it gets the job done for a price that can't be complained about. Nothing special, but definitely puts you in a lazy, ready for bed, sit down and enjoy movies and food type of mood.”
“This Strain is an Awesome buy for the Quality and the Effects" that are "Typically" experienced. My husband and I both tried this at the same time
column4: and we both became Overwhelmingly Wildly Aroused and with a Funny

column1: The Flavor is Very Pleasantly Sweet and the Taste is Indescribably Wonderful!! I Highly Suggest you Give this Strain a shot

column3: “the high doesnt last more than 1.5 hours -2 hours, and is kinda lazy but the price was decent so no complaints overall.  more of a body indica type stone.”
“Perfect for stress and depression, love medicating of this bud”
“Simple and fairly potent...good for smoking or tea...nice pine flavor..vape only lasts 1 hr”
“This strain puts me straight to sleep. I love it right before bed. Definitely not good if you have a lot to do though haha.”
“I really liked the combination of the earthy lemon taste and the head high was crazy despite being an indica.”
“Man this strain really puts me in a good mood every time I smoke it, super relaxing to lay in bed and watch tv. One of the best outdoor scents ever too.”
“You'll feel lazy, hungry, and giggly. Nothing special, good for laying down and eating”
“Early Girl is a fantastic indica with relaxing and sleep inducing effects. One of my favorite strains to smoke before going to bed.”

“great strain to combat stress and to help unwind  after a tough day. Very aromatic, smelled of citrus fruits and a vanilla/sweet smell. Overall great strain, helped with minor pain and stress, no anxiety or paranoia. Like the highlight said a great strain for new comers, good for stress, nothing over the top.”
“Good on the stress relief”
“If you're looking for a relaxed high, Early Girl is your gal! I love smoking this one in the evening while outside. Smells and tastes of citrus and pine. Which I love!”
“very tasty and great high”
“This strain kind of flipped the equalibrium of my friends and my high, I gave us and impeccable rush that gave the majority of the roommates some indefinite reason to master debate about something”

“Not amazing in terms of THC as its like 17%, but as far as how happy of a high it is, I think it tops all. If not it's definitely top 3. Long lasting happy high turns in to couch lock after about 30 minutes. Definitely good for stress relief. Early girl man....”
“If you're looking for a relaxed high, Early Girl is your gal! I love smoking this one in the evening while outside. Smells and tastes of citrus and pine. Which I love!”

“This stuff will get your really high, but will make you feel really depressed if you like sativas. It's a solid sleep aid, but it doesn't have a mellow come down and you really have to sleep it off. The biggest thing I don't like about it is that it makes me space out and get really slow”
“Very easy going strain. no paranoia, just a couple hits make you feel really calm and mellow without being tired. It definately wants to make you chill and just watch tv.”

“great strain to combat stress and to help unwind  after a tough day. Very aromatic, smelled of citrus fruits and a vanilla/sweet smell. Overall great strain, helped with minor pain and stress, no anxiety or paranoia. Like the highlight said a great strain for new comers, good for stress, nothing over the top.”
“Definitely makes you lazy. And hungry lol. Very fragrant, reminds me of bud I smoked back when I was a teenager in BC.”
“This was the perfect blend of a stoney but relaxed high. Perfect for relaxing on the couch while still laughing like a goofball. 5\5 would smoke again”
“Good Smell/Taste.”

“Ive only encountered this strain once, but I loved it. It smelled faintly of chocolate and was probably one of the funnest highs Ive experienced. After smoking it me and my friends became very uplifted and would laugh uncontrollably about anything even slightly funny.”
“some good shit”

“Very sticky feel. Has a sweet pine smell. The high is a 5/5.
5/5 for anxiety (fantastic strain to treat anxiety)
5/5 for relaxed 
3/5 for tired 
5/5 for energized (Gives you a high but doesn't make you want to sit around it's more of a active high)

All around I would say that Early Girl is a very good strain for someone looking to get the nice high but be able to go to work or go outside to do something.”

“I recently had the chance to try some early girl was picked not to long ago. it tastes  fantastic!  the high is very hard hitting lasted a good 3 hours stoned out of my mind. worked very well with my nerve damage in my neck an shoulder would definitely  get again  don't pass it up”
“This was the perfect blend of a stoney but relaxed high. Perfect for relaxing on the couch while still laughing like a goofball. 5\5 would smoke again”
“Trust me, you'll know when it kicks in.”
“Blast-Off. This stuff was surprisingly potent. Hits like a week dab almost?...”
“Had to hit really hard to get any effects and the high doesn't last long. Me and Indica strains just doesn't so it for me.”
“Good for just sitting around the house, listening to music, and eating. The high isn't anything special.”

“Grown this in ireland 53° north
Great strain super purle buds , citrus limey kind off smell taste like sweet skunk. She start to flower end of August and finish October. Super easy to grow and takes to strong doses of nutes very well.
First time grower and very please with this strain Id recommend to anybody new to growing cannabis outdoor.”
“A little premature and has only been cured for less than a day.”
“Definitely makes you lazy. And hungry lol. Very fragrant, reminds me of bud I smoked back when I was a teenager in BC.”
“Very good for the price it seems. Smells great, smokes great. Good pain relief.”

“I picked up a g of Early Girl today, I gotta say it was beautiful looking, and the smell & taste was even better!! I would definitely recommend stopping by your favorite fast food joint, or pick up some munchies at the store because you're going to have a raging case of eat everything!! then smoke a phatty & repeat,,,, enjoy!!!”
“great starter strain for those looking to grow. very hardy strain with a moderate yield and the effects are relaxing rather than completely overpowering considering the THC level”
“so far just averge hybrid”
“I feel so amazing right now. No complaints. 9.5/10 - Would smoke again.”
“I absolutely love it!”
“one of my favorite stands on weed ( even though I prefer sativa over Indica)”
“Im kind of surprised this isnt more popular.”
“wonderfully orange nug that left me feeling rather uplifted and euphoric. Great day smoke.”
“i got to his in c02 oil.  it is av at best to me.  this is very rexlaxing.  try to use it for sleep”
“Ok straight up. This is very sweet, and for being a 75% indica im getting a great head high off this stuff. Its covered in trichomes and THIS SHIT POW!?!?! 5/5”
“A little premature and has only been cured for less than a day.”
“damnnnnnnn nigga”
“Good for people who don't wanna get high”
